trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while accessing the network through a pluggable protocol.
trans-unit.target: 當透過可外掛式通訊協定存取網路發生錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException> class is thrown by classes descended from <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> that implement pluggable protocols for accessing the Internet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException>類別從繼承而來的類別所擲回<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>實作可插式通訊協定來存取網際網路。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown by a descendant of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class, the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property provides the Internet response to the application.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.WebException>擲回的下階的<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>類別<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性將網際網路回應提供給應用程式。

trans-unit.source: **Associated Tips**
trans-unit.target: **相關的秘訣**

trans-unit.source: **Check the Response property of the exception to determine why the request failed.**
trans-unit.target: **請檢查以判斷要求為何失敗的例外狀況的 Response 屬性。**

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Net.WebException> exception is thrown by a descendent of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class, the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property provides the Internet response to the application.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.Net.WebException> 類別的子系擲回 <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> 例外狀況時，<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> 屬性會將網際網路回應提供給應用程式。

trans-unit.source: **Check the Status property of the exception to determine why the request failed.**
trans-unit.target: **請檢查以判斷要求為何失敗的例外狀況的 Status 屬性。**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property of the exception provides status information for the error.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的 <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> 屬性會提供該錯誤的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>。

trans-unit.source: **If you are timing out when stepping into an XML Web Service, set the timeout value for the XML Web Service call to infinite.**
trans-unit.target: **如果逾時逐步執行 XML Web Service，，設定無限的 XML Web Service 呼叫的逾時值。**

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Error: Timeout While Debugging Web Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[錯誤： 逾時偵錯 Web 服務](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebException> class.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Net.WebException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息描述錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> properties are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> 屬性會初始化為 <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>。

trans-unit.source: The following example throws a default <xref:System.Net.WebException>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擲回預設值<xref:System.Net.WebException>。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException>執行個體以初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定的值為`message`。

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`是`null`、<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> properties are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> 屬性會初始化為 <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>。

trans-unit.source: The following example throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> by specifying an error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>藉由指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that contains the information required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含序列化新 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，包含與新 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 關聯之序列化資料流的來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class from the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.WebException> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面<xref:System.Net.WebException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的文字。

trans-unit.source: A nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class with the specified error message and nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和巢狀例外狀況來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException>執行個體以初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定的值為`message`和<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性設定的值為`innerException`。

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`是`null`、<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> properties are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> 屬性會初始化為 <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>。

trans-unit.source: The following example throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> by specifying an error message and nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>藉由指定錯誤訊息和巢狀例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class with the specified error message and status.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和狀態來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to the value of `status`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException>執行個體以初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定的值為`message`和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定的值為`status`。

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`是`null`、<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> properties are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性會初始化為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> by specifying an error message and a <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>藉由指定的錯誤訊息和<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>。

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息的文字。

trans-unit.source: A nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> instance that contains the response from the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> 執行個體，含有遠端主機的回應。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> class with the specified error message, nested exception, status, and response.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息、巢狀例外狀況、狀態和回應來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`, the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to the value of `status`, and the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property set to the value of `response`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException>與初始化執行個體<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定的值為`message`、<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性設定的值為`innerException`、<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定的值為`status`，和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性設定的值為`response`。

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`是`null`、<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following example throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> by specifying an error message and a <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>藉由指定的錯誤訊息和<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" />.
trans-unit.target: 以序列化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the response that the remote host returned.
trans-unit.target: 取得遠端主機所傳回的回應。

trans-unit.source: If a response is available from the Internet resource, a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> instance that contains the error response from an Internet resource; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以從網際網路資源使用回應，則為包含來自網際網路資源之錯誤回應的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> 執行個體，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Some Internet protocols, such as HTTP, return otherwise valid responses indicating that an error has occurred at the protocol level.
trans-unit.target: 網際網路通訊協定，例如 HTTP，否則傳回有效回應，指出錯誤發生在通訊協定層級。

trans-unit.source: When the response to an Internet request indicates an error, <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> sets the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError?displayProperty=nameWithType> and provides the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> that contains the error message in the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.WebException> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 時對網際網路要求回應指出發生錯誤，<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetResponse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設定<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError?displayProperty=nameWithType>，並提供<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>中的錯誤訊息包含<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.WebException>時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The application can examine the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> to determine the actual error.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以檢查<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>來判斷實際的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property and prints to the console the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusDescription%2A> of the underlying <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性，並將列印到主控台<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusDescription%2A>基礎<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得回應的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property indicates the reason for the <xref:System.Net.WebException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性指出的原因<xref:System.Net.WebException>。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> is one of the <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>是其中一個<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProxyNameResolutionFailure> error is not returned to [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProxyNameResolutionFailure>錯誤不會傳回給[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property and prints to the console the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusDescription%2A> of the underlying <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性，並將列印到主控台<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.StatusDescription%2A>基礎<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object into which this <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 將序列化為的物件。

trans-unit.source: The destination of the serialization.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Serializes this instance into the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體序列化為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。
